title: Chaya Macrobiotics - Isetan Shinjuku
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Japanese, Macrobiotic, Organic, Take-out, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Upscale macrobiotic restaurant serving organic dishes. Menu is around 60% fish and 40% vegan food. Nice atmosphere. Typical lunch menu with an entry, main course, dessert, and drink is around Y2200. Part of the Chaya restaurants operation (also in USA). Address in Japanese: 東京都新宿区新宿3-14-1
streetAddress: Isetan Department Store, Main Building 7F, 3-14-1 Shinjuku
